RainbruRPG::Editor::ObjectsTab

RainbruRPG::Editor::ObjectsTab Class Reference

#include <objectstab.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The Objects tab widget.

It display a TreeView of all objects in the world. The objects list it taken from xmlObjectList .

The mouse left double-click action changes with the type of object :

  • if the object is an ObjectMesh (a top-level TreeView item), a dialog is opened.
  • if it is an ObjectPos, we set the Ogre camera to see it.

Member Function Documentation

void RainbruRPG::Editor::ObjectsTab::objectTreeClicked ( QTreeWidgetItem *  it,
int  col 
) [private, slot]

The double click slot of the TreeView.

To test the type of object we clicked, I use the QTreeWidget::indexOfTopLevelItem function. It it returns -1, the given item is not a top-level one, so it is an ObjectPos.

Parameters:
it The treeview item receiving the mouse event
col The column receiving the mouse event

Member Data Documentation

bool RainbruRPG::Editor::ObjectsTab::isNodeHighLighted [private]

Is there a Highlighted node.

The startup value is false. When an object is highlighted, it is set to true and we know we must deleted the last node used for selection highlighting.

See also:
highLightNode
